mapper.insert: insert into expense (ID, EXPENSE_TIME, ITEM_NAME, MONEY, REMARK, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, IS_DELETE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expenseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update expense

ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
